item.title: CVE-2021-20727|2024-08-03T17:53:21.783Z -- hendrik%20erz -- zettlr
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Zettlr from 0.20.0 to 1.8.8 allows an attacker to execute an arbitrary script by loading a file or code snippet containing an invalid iframe into Zettlr.
